quests.name: Hakuna Matata
objectives:
Add some relaxing Furniture to the Peaceful Meadow.
  ‧ 3 Seating
  ‧ 5 Landscaping
Order the pool from Scrooge's Store for 9000 Star Coins.

Or trade it by gathering the following:
  ‧ 2 Shiny Aquamarine
  ‧ 2 Shiny Peridot
  ‧ 3 Topaz
  ‧ 5 Peridot
  ‧ 5 Garnet
Place the Relaxing Oasis in the Meadow.

quests.name: The Great Gathering
objectives: Figure out the last Ingredient for the cake. It asks for Eggs, Milk, Fruit, Wheat, and... something sweet?

Cook the Meals for Simba's gathering:
  ‧ Aurora's Cake (Wheat, Egg, Milk, Any Fruit, Sugarcane)
  ‧ Large Seafood Platter. (4 Seafood, Lemon)

Invite the following Villagers to Simba's gathering:
  ‧ Goofy.
  ‧ Minnie.
  ‧ Maui.
Listen to Simba apologize to Nala.
Plant and grow 9 Carrots in the Meadow

quests.name: Seed of Memories
objectives: Search the Sunlit Plateau's Mines for a hidden entrance.
Investigate the objects in the room:
The table full of tubes and beakers.
Talk to Merlin about what you saw.

Gather the following materials:
  ‧ 3 Dream Shard
  ‧ 3 Night Shard
  ‧ 6 Blueberry
  ‧ 3 Orange Marsh Milkweed
  ‧ 2 Empty Vial

Craft the following potions:
  ‧ Potion of Growth
  ‧ Potion of Dust
Place the Potions in the empty spaces on the Table in the Herbalist Room.
Get the Dreamlight Tree Seed from the Alchemist's Table in the Herbalist Room
Plant the Dreamlight Tree Seed near the pond on the Sunlit Plateau
Water the Dreamlight Tree Seed (Can be done with Miracle Elixir to speed the growth)
Listen to Simba and Scar's conversation.

quests.name: The Dreamlight Grove
objectives: Harvest some Dreamlight Fruit for Simba.
Give a Dreamlight Fruit to Simba.

Gather the following materials:
  ‧ 5 Vitalys Crystal
  ‧ 2 Purified Night Shard
  ‧ 1 Sunlit Plateau Water
  ‧ 3 Dreamlight Fruit
  ‧ 1 Empty Vial
Use the Dreamlight Tree Fertilizer in your Inventory.

Water the flowers in the following parts of the Valley:
  ‧ 5 in the Forgotten Lands.
  ‧ 5 in the Frosted Heights.
  ‧ 5 in the Glade of Trust.
Follow Simba to the Dreamlight Tree.
rewards: Three more Dreamlight Fruit trees grow in the Valley
